description: Whether you're hitting the slopes or headed to the aprés activities, our Chair Lift Beanie is ready for the ride. Everything you love about Merino wool is blended with nylon and durable recycled polyester to help keep your head warm and dry while you shred it season after season. Designed in a fun, winter-inspired pattern with a colorful pom on top, it’s the perfect complement to your snow day ‘fit.
name: Chair Lift Beanie

specs.value: 42% Merino Wool, 36% Polyester, 20% Nylon, 2% Alpaca - Exclusive of Decoration
